channel.title: Default text colour? [Client]
channel.description:
Alright, my theme involves grey black and white for my client...and I want the text on the interfaces to be white (IE the levels, the bonuses, quests, prayers, etc), and writing over ALL 1000+ of these with white would take FOREVER, I already have approximately 200 lines of sendFrame126's for the first 3 interfaces. By interfaces I mean inventory, prayers, weapon, stats, etc. Instead of writing all of these sendFrame126's...anyone know how I would change the default text colour inside the client I am using?
Regards, Zach.
P.S. I cannot find the hex colour of the default yellow to search for it, if you know it post it (it's not normal yellow...for those of you thinking that).

item.title: Default text colour? [Client]
item.dc:creator: @MasterHelper MasterHelper
item.description:
@MasterHelper wrote:

This deals with server side.

Read full topic
